welcome_message_body: Welcome to Parker, where the charm of small-town America meets the beauty of the Southwest. Enjoy our picturesque parks, friendly locals, and vibrant downtown area as you explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Denver International Airport, named after aviation pioneer Elrey B. Jeppesen.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily United Airlines and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily Southwest Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport with a simple registration process.
